title: Ore no Sora Keiji-hen
synopsis: Yasuda Ippei (Shonozaki Ken) is the son of Yasuda Seijiro (Osugi Ren), the head of Yasuda Group, Japan's biggest business conglomerate. Although he is the son of a distinguished family, he has absolutely no disagreeable areas and is liked by everyone.
staff: [['Shirato, Takeshi', ['Director']], ['Chage & Aska', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Motomiya, Hiroshi', ['Original Creator']]]
